definitions.text: (physics) a thermodynamic quantity equivalent to the capacity of a physical system to do work; the units of energy are joules or ergs
examples: energy can take a wide variety of forms
he plays tennis with great energy
Europeans often laugh at American energy

definitions.text: an imaginative lively style (especially style of writing)
a healthy capacity for vigorous activity
examples: jogging works off my excess energy
he seemed full of vim and vigor
the DOE is responsible for maintaining the energy policy

definitions.text: the federal department responsible for maintaining a national energy policy of the United States; created in 1977
